title: $39 -- World-Renowned Flamenco Dancing in Montreal, 35% Off
text:
Thank you for updating your zip code Show One Productions at Place Des Arts 
Catch the Quebec premiere of "Between Worlds" this October in Montreal. See Venezuelan-born­ Siudy Garrido, a world-renowned flamenco dancer and choreographer, perform a fusion of flamenco, hip-hop and breakdancing for more than 35% off tickets . 
The following seating areas are available at Théâtre Maisonneuve in Montreal on Oct. 23 & 24, at 8 p.m.: Rear Orchestra and Dress Circle ... $38.75 (reg. $62.25) Mid Orchestra ... $44.75 (reg. $72.25) Front Orchestra and Dress Circle ... $50 (reg. $82.25) 
The show, set in the future, tells the story of two tribes that go to war over the scarcity of our most precious natural resource. Garrido will also be accompanied on stage by spanish flamenco dancer and actor, Antonio Canales. See a preview of the show here . World-Renowned Flamenco Dancing in Montreal, $ $39
